name: bloXroute
intro: A weapon for front-running DeFi traders
introduce: BloXroute's unique network architecture speeds up to block propagation by up to 2 seconds, transaction propagation by up to 1 second, and transaction detection by up to 50-400 milliseconds.By offering mempool services and transaction/block propagation facilities, the services help decentralised finance (DeFi) traders earn more trades.
